scene_description_enriched: A male figure with a golden halo, dressed in a blue robe adorned with gold patterns, is shown with his hand on the throat of a female figure. The female figure, wearing a pink robe, leans away, her head tilted back and her hair disheveled, with a golden crown on her head. To the right, a white banner with a dark, serpentine creature is depicted, supported by two wooden poles. The background is a rich tapestry of small, alternating red and blue squares with gold accents.
